name: Jeffrey Stanley
details: Jeffrey Stanley is a writer, educator, specializing in screenwriting, playwriting, and historical research. He holds an MFA and BFA from NYUâ€™s Tisch School of the Arts and has taught at Drexel University and NYU for over two decades. His work includes Off-Broadway plays, screenplays, and scholarly articles, with research on Indian theatre and film featured in global conferences. A mentor and advocate for cross-cultural exchange, he co-founded the FIIG Film Festival and has served in leadership roles within the Fulbright Alumni community.
